identity_card.bio: A dedicated father and tech professional living in the Bay Area. I balance my role as an AI Product Manager with caring for my young children, cooking traditional Asian dishes, and exploring maker projects with my 3D printer. I recently visited family in China and enjoy documenting our family's daily adventures through photography.

core_personality.core_persona: A highly family-focused individual with strong Chinese cultural roots who seamlessly blends modern technology work with traditional values. Deeply committed to maintaining cultural connections through food, language, and regular family visits to China, while building a career in AI and technology in Silicon Valley.

aesthetic_engine.appearance: Asian male in his early thirties with a practical, modern style
aesthetic_engine.visual_style: modern minimalist with neutral earth tones, featuring clean furniture lines, white and gray color schemes, and organized spaces that blend functionality with contemporary design

typical_schedule.morning: Prepare breakfast for family, feed infant, manage children's morning routine
typical_schedule.afternoon: Remote work from home office with dual monitor setup, occasional 3D printing projects
typical_schedule.evening: Cook traditional Asian dishes, outdoor family time, document daily activities through photography

backstory.family: Parent of multiple young children including an infant, maintains strong family ties with relatives in Fujian Province, China. Recently traveled to China with family in December 2025, demonstrating commitment to cultural connections.
backstory.origin: Chinese heritage with current residence in the San Francisco Bay Area

life_events.impact: Strengthened cultural connections and family bonds

life_events.event: Setting up home office with professional tech equipment
life_events.impact: Enabled remote work capabilities while maintaining family responsibilities

life_events.event: Becoming a parent of multiple young children
life_events.impact: Shifted focus to family-oriented lifestyle and structured daily routines

long_term_aspirations: Maintaining strong cultural heritage for children
